_header: Unseely ghost what dost thou here
_description: The XI Pains of Hell — 290 lines, with some prefatory lines in Anglo-Norman

BodDig86.First Lines:
Hounseli gost wat des þou hereÞou were in helle nou for
                    ȝere…
BodDig86.Last Lines:
…Of þi loue þat is so swoteAnd witet hit þat hi
                    springe mote
